inclusion.criterion: Pre-operative BPH and/or erectile dysfunction medical treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Pre-operative PSA, transabdominal ultrasound sizing of the prostate, serum creatinine and hemoglobin, urinalysis and culture, cystoscopy findings including the anatomical distribution of prostatic adenomas
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient will undergo Middle-Lobe only PVP procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Postoperative stay and perioperative complications will be documented, including the postoperative hemoglobin, and the need for transfusion
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Medical treatment discontinuation: Alpha-blockers and 5-alpha reductase inhibitors will be stopped prior to discharge for all patients
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Investigators will document the success of the tria-of-void (TOV) prior to discharge
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients neurogenic lower urinary tract dysfunction (Neurogenic Bladder)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Not competent to give consent and/or inability to provide answers to the questionnaire
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has neurogenic bladder, which is a significant exclusion criterion. However, they may still be eligible if other inclusion criteria are met.
